7 ... Bd6

8. Nc7 Kf8 9. h4

9 ... Nxg4

10. e5

White threatens Bxf4.

10 ... f3 11. Rg1

11 ... g5

12. Bxg5

9 ... Na6

If black does not take on g4, white can take on h7.

10. Nxh7 Nb4 11. Qf3
